item.title: Characterization of bacterial microbiota compositions along the intestinal tract in pigs and their interactions and functions
item.description:
Full citation

Crespo-Piazuelo, D., Estellé, J., Revilla, M., Criado-Mesas, L., Ramayo-Caldas, Y., Óvilo, C., Fernández, A.I., Ballester, M., Folch, J.M. (2018). Characterization of bacterial microbiota compositions along the intestinal tract in pigs and their interactions and functions. Scientific Reports, 8(1):12727. doi: 10.1038/s41598-018-30932-6
